title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Carla Jefferson (Pinellas County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Carla Jefferson for repeated misuse of the 911 system.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Location: St. Petersburg, Florida
Suspect: Carla Jefferson, 51
Incident Summary: Jefferson was arrested after making over 12,512 phone calls to the St. Petersburg Police Department and Pinellas County Sheriff’s Office, accounting for approximately 10% of all incoming calls. Her calls were described as vulgar, threatening, and obscene, often holding up emergency lines. After receiving a notice of prosecution, Jefferson called the precinct demanding to be arrested but later refused to answer the door when officers arrived. She was charged with three misdemeanors related to misuse of the 911 system and harassing phone calls.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to Jefferson’s arrest, including footage of any interactions at her residence.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Cori Lynne Ralston following a stabbing incident in Clermont, Florida.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date:  September 4, 2022
Location: Lake Ridge Circle, Clermont, Florida
Suspect: Cori Lynne Ralston, 18
Incident Summary: Deputies responded to Lake Ridge Circle after South Lake Hospital reported that a stabbing victim had left the emergency room without receiving treatment. Upon arrival, deputies found the victim sweating profusely and suffering from a deep stab wound that required transport to Orlando Regional Medical Center as a trauma alert. Initial statements from the victim’s mother falsely claimed the injury was accidental, but another relative later reported hearing an argument between the victim and Ralston. Deputies questioned Ralston, who admitted to arguing with the victim, spraying each other with a kitchen faucet, and then waving a knife, which ultimately stabbed the victim. Due to the severity of the injury, Ralston was arrested for aggravated battery with a deadly weapon and booked into the Lake County Jail.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the incident, including footage of the initial response, witness statements, and the suspect’s questioning.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on July 4, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Dixie Stiles and Macy Regan following a physical altercation on July 4, 2023, in Callaway, Florida.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: July 4, 2023
Location: 6530 Olokee St. and 6526 Olokee St., Callaway, Florida
Suspects: Dixie Stiles, 18, and Macy Regan, 23
Incident Summary: Deputies responded to an assault and battery call at 6530 Olokee St. An investigation determined that an unsupervised house party was occurring at 6526 Olokee St. Just after midnight, a physical altercation took place between Dixie Stiles and Macy Regan after Stiles accused Regan of stealing alcohol and vape pens. Regan allegedly pulled out a 9mm handgun before Stiles shoved it away, leading to a physical fight in which Regan bit off the top of Stiles’ ear. The injury was severe, and the ear was unable to be reattached. Both individuals sustained additional bruises and lacerations before being arrested.
I am requesting copies of body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
